```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
prescriptions <- readRDS("prescription_data.rds")
overdoses <- readRDS("all_overdoses.rds")

# all years
full_data <- left_join(prescriptions, overdoses, by = c("year", "State")) %>% 
  select(State, year, prescription_rate, Age.Adjusted.Rate) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  summarise(avg_prescription_rate = mean(prescription_rate), avg_age_adjusted_rate = mean(age_adjusted_rate))

silhouette_score <- function(k){
  km <- kmeans(full_data[,2:3], centers = k, nstart = 20)
  score <- cluster::silhouette(km$cluster, dist(full_data[, 2:3]))
  mean(score[, 3])
}

k <- 2:10
avg_sil <- sapply(k, silhouette_score)
optimal_k <- which(as.data.frame(avg_sil)$avg_sil == max(avg_sil)) + 1

km <- kmeans(full_data[, 2:3], centers = optimal_k, nstart = 20)

full_data <- mutate(full_data, cluster = as.character(km$cluster))

ggplot(data = full_data, aes(x = avg_prescription_rate, y = avg_age_adjusted_rate)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = cluster)) +
  geom_text_repel(aes(label = state, color = cluster), size = 3) +
  geom_point(data = as.data.frame(km$centers)
             , aes(x = avg_prescription_rate, y = avg_age_adjusted_rate)
             , pch = "X"
             , size = 3) +
  labs(x = "Average Prescription Rate", y = "Average Age Adjusted Overdose Rate", color = "Cluster Assignment")
```
